kw.name: On The Items List Page
kw.doc: Open browser and login dcTrack (default: _admin_) and enter the items list page.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Prepare a dictionary variable as below: | =Variables= | =name= | =password= | | {'name': 'admin', 'password': 'sunbird'} | name=admin | password=xxx1234!!! | Usage: | Login | {'name': 'admin', 'password': 'sunbird'} |

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
